title: 【How To Train Your Dragon】驯龙高手MOD【1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/1.10/1.11/1.12/1.13】
author: 爱心魔王FHC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2020-5-9 22:18 编辑 

How To Train Your Dragon Add-onHTTYD is an addon that introduces rideable dragons from the famous franchise “How to train your dragon” to Minecraft, The addon is also combined with a script that allow a realistic flying behaviors. Unfortunately scripts are still exclusive to Windows 10, So I’ve provided a second behavior pack for other platforms that grants the old way of flying (by jumping and slowly falling).这个MOD在游戏中添加了驯龙高手中的龙，并且可以乘骑，还有更真实的飞行动作（不过只能在win10版）。所以我还提供了第二个行为包给其他平台的用户，使用旧版飞行动作（通过跳起和缓慢的落下）注意The new beta is heavily based on scripts, Only Windows 10 and Android (with BlockLauncher) can actually use it最新版的脚本（飞行动作）只支持win10版和用方块启动器的安卓版作者：StarkTMA_YTIf you find any bugs, Please make sure to tweet them to me at @StarkTMA_YT
如果你发现任何BUG，请在推特上联系作者各种龙的介绍Night FuryNight Fury is one of the rarest dragons in the franchise, It has 3 Variants
Night Fury是最稀有的龙之一，他有三种变体









Light FuryLight Fury, One of the newest Dragons from the 3rd movie, It has 2 Variants
Light Fury是第三季电影中最新的龙之一，他有两种变体









Deadly NadderProbably the most popular dragon of all time, Has 3 variants.
一直以来Deadly Nadder可能都是最受欢迎的龙，他有三种变体



Monstrous NightmareA new and a fan favorite Dragon, comes with 4 variants
一种新的并且是粉丝最喜欢的龙，他有四种变体





行为– EGGS!! Bred Dragons will now lay eggs instead of the usual birth.
- 龙现在会下蛋，而不是直接生出小龙


– Dragon Eggs will start shaking 20 to 40 mins after being laid down
- 龙蛋在被生下后20到40分钟会开始摇动

– Dragon Eggs will hatch 40 mins after being laid down
- 龙蛋会在40分钟后被孵化出来

– A new taming mechanics, Use a fish to tame the dragon. Once tamed they will not follow you or defend you they’ll just be friendly.
- 一种新的驯服机制，使用鱼去驯服。一旦被驯服，他们就不会跟着你，也不会保护你，他们只会很友好

– To fly them, Right click a tamed dragon to ride then open the inventory and saddle him. When Saddled they will follow you, They will not fly on their own, You can make them sit, You can leash them.
- 右键骑上龙，打开物品栏，放上鞍，就能控制龙飞行，你还可以让他们坐下或者把他们拴起来

– You can also put a chest on a tamed dragon and also remove it, (Right click with a chest to chest him, Right click with another chest to unchest him)
- 在被驯服的龙身上还可以放箱子，用箱子右键他们放置，再用箱子右键是拿下来。


– The Night Fury now cycles between 2 Melee and 1 Fire Charge attacks randomly.
- Night Fury会在2次近战和1次火攻之间随机切换

– The Light Fury will cycle between 3 Melee and 1 Fire Charge attacks randomly.
- Light Fury会在3次近战和1次火攻之间随机切换

– The Deadly Nadder will cycle between 1 Melee, 1 Fire Charge and 1 Spikes(shooting spikes from it’s tail) attacks randomly.
- Deadly Nadder会在1次近战、1次火焰弹攻击和1次长钉攻击（从它的尾巴射出尖刺）之间随机切换

– Baby dragons will not cycle between the Fire Charge / Spikes ability until they become adults.
- 幼年龙不会切换技能，只会近战，直到他们长大


游戏版本1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/1.10/1.11/1.12/1.13(beta) 下载支持作者请去原帖下载
百度网盘/百度云（包含作者介绍视频）: https://pan.baidu.com/s/10eTgelll1pRtrmDJtHHP9w
提取码: b5em注意要在创建世界的时候开启Experimental Gameplay
